Peggy Hopkins Joyce https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peggy_Hopkins_Joyce 0 Peggy Hopkins Joyce (May 26, 1893 – June 12, 1957) was an American actress, artist's model and dancer. In addition to her performing career, Joyce was known for her flamboyant life, with numerous engagements, six marriages to wealthy men, subsequent divorces, a series of scandalous affairs, a collection of diamonds and furs, and a generally lavish lifestyle. Peggy_Hopkins_Joyce ( May_26_,_1893 – June_12_,_1957 ) was an_American_actress , artist 's_model_and_dancer .
